topic.title: Publishing with a DITA-OT Project File

body.note: When a DITA-OT project file is open in Author mode, there is a play button () next to the project file name. You can use this button to publish all deliverables specified in the file. While the transformation is running, the button turns into a stop button in case you need to terminate the process.
body.p: During publishing, whenever WebHelp and PDF final outputs are generated, the generated documents are opened in the corresponding application (web browser, PDF reader). This feature can be inhibited by editing the transformation scenario and unchecking the In System Application checkbox from the Output tab.
